summary: This bill, the Community Training, Education, and Access for Medical Students Act of 2025 (Community TEAMS Act of 2025), aims to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide community-based training opportunities for medical students, specifically in rural areas and medically underserved communities. It authorizes grants to eligible entities to support medical student clinical rotations in healthcare facilities within these communities, facilitating long-term physician practice in high-need areas. The bill outlines eligibility criteria for grant recipients, application requirements, and project evaluation guidelines.
